src:
مسئولة أمريكية تبدأ اليوم جولة أوروبية تشمل زيارة لبريطانيا وفرنسا
02 Nov 2019, 07:51 by أ ش أ
أ ش أ تبدأ مانيشا سينج مساعد وزير الخارجية الأمريكية للشؤون الاقتصادية والتجارية جولة أوروبية اعتبارا من اليوم السبت تشمل زيارة كل من بريطانيا وفرنسا وتستمر حتى السابع من نوفمبر الجاري.وقالت مورجان أورتاجوس المتحدثة باسم وزارة الخارجية الأمريكية إن زيارة سينج إلى بريطانيا تستهدف تعزيز فرص الاستثمار للولايات المتحدة في قطاع السفر والسياحة خلال سوق السفر العالمي ، كما ستلتقي بمسؤولي الطيران البريطانيين لمناقشة التعاون المستمر بين البلدين في قضايا الطيران التجاري ، وستستضيف مائدة مستديرة مع شركات الطيران والفضاء لمناقشة التمكين الاقتصادي للمرأة.وأضافت أورتاجوس أن المسئولة الأمريكية ستقوم في العاصمة الفرنسية باريس بمناقشة أولويات الولايات المتحدة مع المسؤولين في البعثة الأمريكية للمنظمة الأوروبية للتعاون الاقتصادي والتنمية.
text:
Flute of the Victory: It's fire, it's goal
02 Nov 2019, 07:00 by Vitor Guedes

Sao Paulo

"The curtains open, the show begins." Voice seduces. Who tells a story increases a point. Audio illuminates, is light, glows, drives. The version, as a rule, is always better than the raw fact. Sometimes, so much the better than the goal, here's the big deal.



Claudio Oliveira


Narrating is not just reporting. It is the art of creating, adding, enchanting. Make you dream even during a nightmare performance. It is deceiving without stealing, quibbling without hiding, increasing without misrepresenting, getting drunk and getting drunk. Opening the smile, the self and the other, grimace of everything. It is turning nothing into something special. And what is already important, in eternal, dazzling.
Life imitates football. And it should mimic more, much more, even more. Objectivity is less, imagining is much more, feeling full. The achievements of personal life, as happened with the achievements of Palmeiras de Fiori Gigliotti or my Corinthians, would have much more poetry and, therefore, life, told in the lively voice of the announcer of the Brazilian fans ... In the "twilight of the game", "Hold on, sweetheart." Bizarre kisses and tied or broxing encounters would be romanticized as much more interesting, thought-provoking, intoxicating chapters. And what was worth it would be any scene ...
I shouldn't, but I partially remember the worst times I had at other past Carnivals. The crime would pay more if it were counted at the base of the “balloon rising, balloon descending” than in the ordinary until the “mouth of the bottle”. The dark brunette of yore would have far more curvy and beautiful features if described by Fiori than the terrible trustworthy sight; the blonde's waist would be half a meter thinner; the charm of the most abundant japinha; the exaggerated mark of the most piquitic black ... Ah, who did not joke of Fiori in time to increase the beauty of the moment "is fire, is goal" when narrating the feat to a friend ...
How many boring 0-0 did not become merciless strikes and how many balls in the beam were not transformed into majestic potholes?
Life like football is for those who love more than they think.
×
“The curtains are closed, the show ends.” Congratulations, Paulo Rogério and Mauro Beting for the definitive “Fiori Gigliotti, the announcer of the Brazilian fans”, an unmissable work that motivated this chronicle.
